allow: Bash(powershell -Command "echo ''SELECT con.conname as constraint_name, att.attname as column_name FROM pg_constraint con JOIN pg_attribute att ON att.attnum = ANY(con.conkey) AND att.attrelid = con.conrelid WHERE con.conrelid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_class WHERE relname = ''''team_members'''') AND con.contype = ''''f'''';'' | & ''C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\15\bin\psql.exe'' ''postgres://postgres.togejqdwggezkxahomeh:uepQ7vz5dwvvucOG@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres?sslmode=require''")

Bash(powershell -Command "echo ''SELECT con.conname, pg_get_constraintdef(con.oid) as definition FROM pg_constraint con WHERE con.conrelid = (SELECT oid FROM pg_class WHERE relname = ''''team_members'''') AND con.contype = ''''f'''';'' | & ''C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\15\bin\psql.exe'' ''postgres://postgres.togejqdwggezkxahomeh:uepQ7vz5dwvvucOG@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres?sslmode=require''")

Bash(powershell -Command "echo ''SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''''team_members'''' AND column_name IN (''''department_id'''', ''''role_id'''');'' | & ''C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\15\bin\psql.exe'' ''postgres://postgres.togejqdwggezkxahomeh:uepQ7vz5dwvvucOG@aws-1-us-east-1.pooler.supabase.com:6543/postgres?sslmode=require''")
Bash(pnpm dlx supabase gen types typescript:*)
